newsitem.title: USA: Tesoro hires president of new unit.
newsitem.headline: Tesoro hires president of new unit.

text.p: Tesoro Petroleum Corp said Wednesday it had named Donald Nyberg as president of a new subsidiary which will be formed to act as a holding company for Tesoro Coastwide Services Co and additional acquisitions.
Nyberg was most recently was vice president, strategic planning, at MAPCO Inc where he headed business development.

At Tesoro he will focus on developing and implementing growth initiatives to expand the marine services business along the Gulf Coast into other new domestic areas and internationally, the company said.
